title: PBE invitation but can't create account?
body: I got an email from riot a few days ago saying I was invited to the PBE. They gave me a link to create an account but it just takes me to the 'application pending' page. Is there any resolution to this? Because I've seen a few people post about this topic but I haven't seen any resolutions to the problem.

replies.body: I looked into the account you are posting form, but was unable to see an acceptance to the PBE.  In case you have any other accounts, the notification may have been for that.  Just in case if that's the case for you, try logging onto those accounts.  If you have any issues, you can also reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll see if we can help locate it!
I opened a support ticket already. I don't think it was for another linked account because in the email it says 'NyQuiL7'
